## UnicodeUtils.weakBidirectionalRanges variable

Latin and arabic numerals are considered to have weak directionality: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Basic\_Latin\_(Unicode\_block)\#Table\_of\_characters https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Arabic\_(Unicode\_block)\#Block

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
weakBidirectionalRanges: number[][]
```
